job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Business Administration, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related discipline.

jd: From: UTTAM BARMAN, SONITALENTCORP uttam.barman@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: uttam.barman@sonitalentcorp.com Job Title – Business System AnalystJob Location - onsite in Westminster, CO (the Denver area)Need To be localDuration - 5 Months+Visa -Any Visa except H1B,cpt,optMode Of Interview - Phone/SkypeNote - Need LinkedInJob Description –Top skills:1. Business Intelligence Tools2. SQL 3. Operations background• Interview process:1st round with Manas2nd round panel with team• Temp-to-Hire?: No• Additional note: Manas needs this worker to support APAC hours, Singapore, specificallyBusiness Systems AnalystOur client is seeking a highly skilled Business Systems Analyst with a strong background in business intelligence tools, SQL, and operations. This role requires supporting APAC hours, specifically Singapore, and involves developing data-driven solutions to support strategic business initiatives.QualificationsBachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Business Administration, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related discipline.Proven work experience as a Data Analyst, Business Analyst, or similar role, with a focus on data analysis and stakeholder management.Prior experience in the sales or marketing analytics domain.Strong proficiency in SQL for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.Extensive experience with business intelligence tools such as Salesforce, Tableau, Domo, and Power BI, including data modeling and visualization.Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to extract insights from complex datasets and present them in a clear and concise manner.Experience with at least one object-oriented programming language such as Python or R.Strong stakeholder management skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with individuals at all levels of the organization.Excellent problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities, with a keen attention to detail.Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to present complex data analysis findings to non-technical stakeholders.Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines.Familiarity with statistical analysis and data mining techniques is a plus. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/uttam-barman-b494b1254/Email: uttam.barman@sonitalentcorp.comContact: 8599464061
